name: Santa's Workshop (itch) (crowley318)
description:
The Gremlins are back! They invaded Santa's Workshop and destroying the presents! Defeat the Gremlins to save the Christmas!

WASD to move
Shift to run
Mouse click to attack
Space bar to jump

Tips for the best player experience

Use Google Chrome
Disable AdBlock if activated on your device
The map also plays on Android devices
